name: Springsuit
description:
The game takes place in the future, as a human exploring the universe. During one of his adventures he crashes with his spaceship and then has to find the lost SOS transmitter again. The clou is that his special space suit broke on impact and he now jumps uncontrollably.

This was made during the GMTK GameJam 2020 and is the first Game I ever created(finished).  The assets(Game Art) are all mine.

OUT OF CONTROL: the jumping is out of control

I'd love to get some feedback.
